sentences.sContent: It's this reason why experts advise parents against helicoptering their children out of college if they complain about homesickness.
sentences.sContent_eng: It's this reason why experts advise parents against helicoptering their children out of college if they complain about homesickness.
sentences.sCn: 这就是专家给家长们建议的原因：在孩子抱怨乡愁时，不要把他们接出校园。
